titleStmt.title: The speech which the Speaker of the House of Commons made unto the King in the House of Lords, at his passing of the bills therein mentioned, the 29. of August in the year of our Lord 1660.
titleStmt.author: Grimston, Harbottle, Sir, 1603-1685.
England and Wales. Parliament. House of Commons.

publicationStmt.publisher: printed by Edward Husband and Tho. Newcomb, printers to the House of Commons,

notesStmt.note: The Speaker of the House of Commons = Sir Harbottle Grimston.
Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
